ethumage kulundul granthaya 1950 di pala kala panchathanthra anuwadaya wana athara, 1958 di rachitha dewanna bauddha rajadhani pilibanda thorathuru athulath pahiyan deshatana warthawa nam pariwarthana granthaya yi. 1964 di sinhala sthupawansa‘‘‘ sanskaranaya da (mahacharya wimala wijesuriya samanga) pala kale ya. 1995 di bhasha adhyayanaya ha sinhala wyawaharaya da 1998 di sinhala bhashadhyayana ithihasaya yana shasthriya grantha sandaha rajya sammana da himi wima thawath suwishesha siduwimaki. 1992 di sinhala bhashawe sambhawaya ha parinamaya, 1996 di sinhala bhashawe prabhawaya ha prawardhanaya, 2001 di mahacharya wilhelm gayigar: sinhalaye wag widyathmaka swarupaya aadi poth sinhala bhashawe ithihasaya ha aithihasika wagwidyawa sambandha wishishta paryeshanayo wethi.

shri lankawe therawadi bhikshunge nikaya ho parshwayanta adalawa kathikawath sampadanaya kara liyapadinchi kirima sandaha da; sama bhikshun wahanse namak wisin ma eki bhikshun wahanseta adala wana nikaye ho parshwaye liyapadinchi kathikawathe widhiwidhanawalata anukulawa kriya kala yuthu bawata widhiwidhana salaswima sandaha da; yam liyapadinchi karana lada kathikawathaka widhiwidhanawalata patahaniwa katayuthu karana bhikshun wahanselata dandana panawima sandaha da, eeta sambandha ho aanushangika karana sandaha widhiwidhana salaswima sandaha da wu panathaki.
